Trinity::

In her kitten form, Scat was taller and bigger than her. She walked 
up to him slowly and tried to stick her paw out for him to 
shake. "Please put the dagger down. I want to be your friend. Won't 
you please at least try. I won't hurt you. Your way bigger than me 
and could easily hurt me. But, I'm not going to run away, I want to 
make a friend. Don't you want to be friends? Friends help one onther 
out when they need it. And I can help you, if you want."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>      "Shhh!  I'm keeping an eye on them but... oh well now they've 
seen 
> Windlord.  We might s well go out there and try to help that poor 
little 
> squirrel."  He heads out from behind the trees and slowly walks 
over toward 
> Scrat.  He kept his hands turned with the palms up in the universal 
symbol of 
> peace.  "Can I help you at all?"
